text: Hi everyone, it’s Helen here. As you know I’ve been really busy over the past
couple of months working on
different kinds of projects and also moving house
So today I thought I would do a really quick video update you guys with
what’s been going on with my life
The first update is regarding my recently published cookbook
To my great surprise, the book has received amazing support from my viewers and readers.
and it has been selling so well on amazon that
Sahabook- a publisher in Vietnam contacted me
and offered to publish the book in Vietnam
in both English and Vietnamese versions.
The English book is now selling at most tourist places like Tan Son Nhat airport at Gate 17, Saigon post office, etc.
It’s so cool to see my book displayed at the bookstores
and I was even more thrilled to see some tourist actually
pick it up to have a look
The Vietnamese version called “Mon an Viet voi Helen” is now also available for purchase on Amazon.
It has also been published by Sahabook and
available now for purchase in most bookstores in Vietnam.
You can check out my website or the links I will put below to know how and where to get the book.
The book has also been featured many times on Vietnam TV like
VTV1, VTV4, VTC10, etc.
OH, and because of the success of the book,
the people from Createspace – the publishing company of Amazon
have contacted me personally to congratulate
and also offer a free conversion service to Kindle for my book.
How awesome is that! So now if you have a Kindle, you can also get
copy of my book to your Kindle, too.
The second update is regarding my new
cooking studio. I've been moving quite a few times since started Youtube
and cooking in various rent houses from
dormitory and flat share in Germany to serviced apartment in VN.
Finally I have managed to build a studio kitchen for Helen’s Recipes on my own!.
It’s so tiring yet so so exciting to witness
the construction process
from day 1 when the first brick was layed
untill the final finishing touch. If you would like me to do a detailed
kitchen tour, I would be really pleased! By the way, I have finally received
the Silver Button
from Youtube. I know I have surpassed the
100,000-subsriber milestone
a while ago but finally I received the Silver Button from Youtube

and now I will surely put it in a very
special place in my new
kitchen studio. Finally some more updates regarding my online store

helenKIT. As you might have
already known
It's selling hand-painted T-shirts and aprons
for Vietnamese food fans
It’s one of my efforts to create artworks that honor Vietnamese cuisine.
Since the first launch in November last year, we have been working really hard to
develop more new products.
Now most of the popular Vietnamese dishes like Banh mi,
pho, goi cuon, nuoc mam are featured
on aprons and T-shirts with fun slogans.
You can now also customize the message to make it unique presents for your beloved.
We also have promotional campaigns
that offer many great deals with helenKIT items and a signed copy of my book.
Also if you would like to have something to decorate your kitchen
or restaurant wall, check this out!
That’s it. I’m really really glad that I have you all with me on this journey.

Thank you so much for being so supportive. 
I work really hard on all of this,
and seeing how my work is really appreciated by all of you,
it totally worths the efforts
I hope you're all well and I will see you then in the next video
Thank you for watching. Bye bye
